title: Logitech Keyboard LCD Screen bugs out for LoL
body:
The Applet that shows CS, Gold per Min., KDA, etc. has been bugged out for quite some time. The text gets all wonky, and I can't figure out a way to fix it.
This same issue was posted by another player on an EUW thread here with pictures of the bugged text:

https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/aOmjjR23-714-status-applet-logitech-keyboards-display-issue

Anyone else experiencing this? It's been like this for quite some time and I thought maybe the LCD screen was going bad, but I just recently looked more closely at it, and those LED lights work just fine in other games / applets.

I run on a Logitech G510S Keyboard, if anyone has a solution. =)

replies.body: I have been having this issue for several months now... losing hope for a fix

I don't really have a good way to troubleshoot that keyboard since we weren't involved in how it was built or programmed. It sounds like the software for that screen might be outdated after one of our recent patches, and it's not able to read the data from the game correctly anymore. 

Your best bet for getting this fixed will probably be on Logitech's message boards, but I was also able to find this for you -> [**Logitech Keyboard Issues**](https://community.logitech.com/s/search/All/Home/League)

The Software is updated continuosly, also the profiles are.

But asking in the Logitech forums guess waht you get ... answers just like the same. "The error might be caused by the game client. Ask Riot for a fix."
It's always pretty easy to say "the other guys will fix it". but only people with skill (like the lol devs ;) ) can do it.

As I'm not a programmer i can't fix it myself, but for me it looks like the interface, which provides the data, changed...
